data.intent: <the meaning of this language, something like 'greeting.hello'>
utterances: <some examples of language with the meaning>
answers: <Whatever you'd like the bot to respond with>

buttons.type: <can be anything, basically, this list will just be sent to the client, which will determine the functionality based on the type>

triggers.type: <an action defined on your onyx core instance>

args.example: <whatever arguments need to be supplied to your action>

attachments: <you can define some attachments that should be sent with the request>

data.enhance: <boolean, either true or false, this will determine whether or not an answer will be enhanced using chatgpt>
